institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 15 (Preparation and selection of list of deliberation committee candidates)
contents: Article 15 (Preparation and selection of a list of deliberation member candidates) ① The list of deliberation member candidates for the selection of division heads, chief judges, and deputy judges of national competitions shall be tripled, including those recommended by the Korean Committee human resources pool and the chairperson of the city/provincial operation committee. Based on the above, the chairman of the steering committee selects the order of appointment. Revised on February 22, 2018. ② The deliberation committee members for selecting the vice-examiner shall include the technical vice-chairman and the head of the division, and the deliberation committee members for the selection of the vice-examiner shall include the technical vice-chairman, the division head, and the auditor for the relevant year, and The deliberation committee members for member selection must include the technical vice chair, division heads, and the head and deputy head of the review for the year. Revised on February 22, 2018., ③ When preparing a list of deliberation committee members, those who can perform fair and transparent work are selected from among experts with extensive experience in skill competitions., ④ If any of the selected deliberation committee members are unable to attend, the candidate They are selected in order of lowest rank on the list., ⑤ The standards for preparing the list of candidates for the City/Provincial Committee Deliberation Committee shall be in accordance with the provisions of the City/Provincial Committee.
